source: F1 ability library; code-per-ability in game/abilities.js

dv_force_choke.label: Force Choke: Choose a hostile figure in your line of sight. That figure suffers 2 Damage and 1 Strain.

dv_brutality.label: Brutality: Perform 2 attacks. Each attack must have a different target.

luke_saber_strike.label: Saber Strike: Perform a melee attack using 1 red and 1 yellow die. This attack gains Pierce 3.

cc:advance_warning.label: You and an adjacent friendly figure each gain 1 movement point

cc:against_the_odds.label: If opponent has â‰¥8 more VPs, up to 3 figures become Focused

Fool Me Once.label: Return opponent discard to box; draw 1 if SPY

Heart of Freedom.label: Discard 1 HARMFUL, recover 2 Damage, gain 2 MP
Discard 1 HARMFUL, recover 2 Damage, gain 2 MP

Apex Predator.label: Focus, Hidden, 2 Power Tokens, 2 MP (recovery on hostile defeat manual)

Price of Glory.label: Discard 1 HARMFUL, gain 2 MP (optional Power Tokens manual)

Worth Every Credit.label: Discard 1 HARMFUL, gain 2 MP (VP when next hostile defeated manual)

Rank and File.label: Gain 1 movement point (you; adjacent TROOPERS resolve manually)

Urgency.label: Gain movement points equal to Speed +2

Battle Scars.label: Gain 1 Power Token (or 2 if suffered 3+ Damage)

Hit and Run.label: Perform an attack; after it resolves gain 3 MP

Heavy Ordnance.label: +1 Hit (or +2 Hit and Pierce 2 vs object)

Bladestorm.label: +1 Surge; after attack, hostiles within 2 spaces suffer 1 Damage

Camouflage.label: Become Hidden when attack declared on you

Assassinate.label: +3 Hits (first CC this attack; no other CCs)

Size Advantage.label: Perform attack vs SMALL: +2 Hit, Weaken

Rally.label: Discard all HARMFUL conditions (Stun, Weaken, Bleed)

Glory of the Kill.label: If defender was defeated, recover 3 Damage

Repair.label: Adjacent friendly DROID or VEHICLE recovers 3 Damage

Smuggled Supplies.label: Choose one: Recover 2; +1 Evade when defending until EOR; or +1 Surge to attack until EOR

chooseOne.label: +1 Evade when defending until end of round
+1 Surge to attack results until end of round

Opportunistic.label: After a hostile figure suffers Damage: gain 3 movement points

Reactive Loyalties.label: After attack targeting you resolves: IMPERIAL — attacker suffers 3 Damage; SCUM — gain 3 VPs; REBEL — recover 3 Damage

Cavalry Charge.label: Until end of round: +1 Block when defending; +1 Hit when friendly TROOPER within 3 attacks (apply manually)

Foresee.label: Look at top 2 of opponent's deck, discard 1 (manual). If discarded cost ≤1, draw 1

Preservation Protocol.label: When you have suffered Damage equal to Health: instead of defeated, recover 1 Damage

Mandalorian Tactics.label: Choose one: Gain 4 MP or perform an attack without spending an action

chooseOne.label: Perform an attack without spending an action (resolve manually)

Disengage.label: When a hostile figure enters a space within 3 spaces of you: gain 3 movement points

Force Drain.label: One hostile within 2 spaces suffers 3 Damage (Stunned/Weakened and recover 3 if FORCE USER manual)

Final Stand.label: When friendly within 3 would be defeated: move 2, gain 1 Power Token, attack, then that figure defeated (rest manual)

Master Operative.label: Become Focused and +1 Surge when declaring Close Quarters

Primary Target.label: Become Focused and +1 Hit when attacking highest-cost hostile (target validation manual)

Tools for the Job.label: Add 1 attack die to the attack pool

Wild Attack.label: Add 1 red die to attack pool, 1 white die to defense pool

Wild Fire.label: Remove up to 2 dice from defense pool

One in a Million.label: Remove all defense dice (only when not your activation)

Brace Yourself.label: +2 Block to defense (when not attacker's activation)

Brace for Impact.label: Add 1 black die to defense pool

Stealth Tactics.label: Add 1 white die to defense pool

Knowledge and Defense.label: Add 1 black die to defense pool (passive manual)

Parry.label: +1 Block or +1 Evade when defending (default: +1 Block)

Spinning Kick.label: This attack gains Cleave 1 and Cleave 2

Cruel Strike.label: Perform attack; it gains Surge: Pierce 1, Weaken

Element of Surprise.label: Remove 1 die from defense pool (LOS: target had no LOS at start of activation; confirm manually)

Concentrated Fire.label: Add 1 red die to attack pool (you become Stunned — apply manually)

Inspiring Speech.label: Up to 2 friendly figures adjacent to you become Focused

Trandoshan Terror.label: Add 1 yellow die to attack pool (when declaring Indiscriminate Fire)

Regroup.label: Discard all HARMFUL conditions from adjacent friendly figures

Take Position.label: Until end of round, +1 Block when defending (push immunity manual)

Survival Instincts.label: Until end of round, +1 Block and +1 Evade when defending

Hour of Need.label: Recover Damage equal to current round number

Take Cover.label: Until end of round, +1 Block and -2 Accuracy when defending

Emergency Aid.label: Adjacent figure recovers 2 Damage (3 if GUARDIAN or LEADER)

Celebration.label: After unique hostile defeated: gain 4 VP

Wild Fury.label: Become Focused (multiple attacks and Stunned/Bleeding manually)

Espionage Mastery.label: Return one CC from discard to hand, then draw 1

Guild Programming.label: Become Focused before each Rapid Fire attack

Prepared for Battle.label: Gain 2 Power Tokens (adjacent LEADER part manual)

Forward March.label: You gain 1 MP (each friendly within 2 spaces manual)

Marked Territory.label: Gain 1 Power Token (exterior figure part manual)

Looking for a Fight.label: Gain 1 Power Token (move or push manual)

Force Surge.label: Gain 1 MP; one adjacent hostile suffers 2 Damage and 1 Strain

Veteran Instincts.label: Gain 2 Power Tokens (choose Hit/Surge and Block/Evade manually)

Lord of the Sith.label: Gain 2 MP (Force Choke or attack manual)

Retaliation.label: Choose one: Become Focused; Gain 2 Power Tokens; or Gain 2 MP

Self-Defense.label: When hostile enters adjacent: that figure suffers 1 Damage

Slippery Target.label: When hostile enters adjacent: gain MP equal to your Speed

Grisly Contest.label: Adjacent hostile suffers 2 Damage (you suffer 2 Strain manual)

Dirty Trick.label: When hostile enters adjacent: that figure suffers 3 Strain (or Stun manual)

Force Jump.label: Move up to 5 spaces (MOBILE during movement manual)

Counter Attack.label: After attack on you resolved: if adjacent to attacker, attacker suffers 2 Damage

Desperate Escape.label: At end of round: move up to 6 spaces

On the Lam.label: When attack declared on you: perform a move (gain MP = Speed)

Dark Energy.label: Choose SMALL figure within 3: push 1 (manual), then 1 Damage

Dangerous Prey.label: Attacker suffers 1 Damage (3 if adjacent manual); then move 2 (manual)

Deflection.label: -2 Accuracy when defending (if no damage to you, attacker suffers 2 manual)

Ambush.label: Move 4 to space adjacent to attacker (terrain condition manual), then attacker suffers 2 Damage

Right Back At Ya!.label: Attacker suffers 1 Damage (3 if you spent Block Token manual)

Payback.label: Perform attack targeting attacker (manual); +2 Surge to attack results

Toxic Dart.label: One hostile within 3 and LOS suffers 1 Strain (Weaken and range manual)

Face to Face.label: Move up to 2 spaces (then attack manual)

Heightened Reflexes.label: While attacking a figure: remove 1 defense die from defense results

Capture the Weary.label: Adjacent hostile becomes Weakened (or 2 Strain if already Weakened)

Stimulants.label: You or adjacent suffers 1 Damage (manual); then gain 1 MP and become Focused

On a Mission.label: Move up to 5 spaces (push SMALL when entering manual)

Jump Jets.label: Place your figure in an empty space within 5 spaces (treat as 5 MP)

Force Lightning.label: One hostile within 2 suffers 2 Damage (figures adjacent to it 2 Damage, Stun manual)

Eerie Visage.label: Each hostile with LOS suffers 1 Strain, Weakened (one adjacent auto; rest manual)

Armed Escort.label: Until end of round friendly within 2 gain +1 Evade

Crush.label: When you end movement in space with figures: one SMALL suffers 4 Damage

Telekinetic Throw.label: One hostile within 3 LOS suffers Damage (roll 2 blue manual)

Out of Time.label: One hostile within 3 LOS suffers Strain = round (manual)

Wookiee Rage.label: Adjacent hostile suffers 1 per your Damage (max 3)

Karabast!.label: Per your Damage choose hostile within 2, each suffers 1 (one auto)

Disarm.label: When adjacent hostile Bleeding from your attack: 1 Damage Weakened (manual)

Miracle Worker.label: When friendly within 3 would be defeated: recover 3 instead

Devotion.label: Draw 1 card with chosen figure's trait (search manual)

Whistling Birds.label: Move 2 then up to 3 within 2 suffer Hit (one adjacent 1 Damage)

Hunt Them Down.label: When declaring Lightsaber Throw: +2 Accuracy, Cleave 2

Force Illusion.label: When hostile in LOS attacking: defender becomes Hidden

Dying Lunge.label: When Damage = Health: move 2, melee attack, then defeated (manual)

Fuel Upgrade.label: Until end of round VEHICLES +1 Evade (+1 Speed manual)

Collateral Damage.label: After attack: figure within 2 of target space suffers 2 Damage (honor targeting)

Escalating Hostility.label: After attack that did not miss: defender suffers 1 Strain (+1 per other in discard manual)

Second Chance.label: Attachment: before defeated or end of round recover 2 Damage, discard card

Rest in Peace.label: At end of round when you discard this card: draw 1

Reduce to Rubble.label: After attack that did not miss (accuracy): each within 2 of target 1 Damage (one auto; Rubble manual)

Hide in Plain Sight.label: Until end of round you cannot be the target of an attack

Smoke Grenade.label: Friendly within 2 of chosen space gains 2 MP (choose space, place shield manual)

Guerilla Warfare.label: Each friendly with no other friendly within 2 gains Block token and Hidden (you Hidden auto; rest manual)

Arcing Shot.label: Before attack: may target figure/object adjacent to empty space (+1 Accuracy manual)

Balancing Force.label: Rebel: each player chooses 3 figures, roll red, recover = Hit (1 auto)

Blend In.label: Attachment: cannot be targeted (discard EOA or when declare attack manual)

Built on Hope.label: Look at top 3, place 1 in hand (rest manual)

Burst Fire.label: Perform attack +1 Hit (stun adjacent if damage manual)

Close the Gap.label: BRAWLER move 2 then armor token (you 2 MP honor)

Covering Fire.label: Up to 3 TROOPERS Hidden, Surge Stun (you Hidden auto)

Definition: 'Love'.label: Attack 5+ spaces without action (remove 1 red manual)

Deploy the Garrison.label: TROOPER/GUARDIAN within 4 gain 2 MP or 1 Hit (you 2 MP honor)

Disorient.label: After hostile with BENEFICIAL suffers damage: discard 1 BENEFICIAL, that figure 2 Strain

Draw!.label: Perform attack without using an action

Droid Mastery.label: J4X Focused then attack or deploy (manual)

Face Me!.label: Push hostile to adjacent then attack (4 MP honor)

Feint.label: Remove 1 attack and 1 defense die results (1 defense auto)

Get Behind Me!.label: Move 3 into space adjacent to friendly, attack targets you (3 MP honor)

Grenadier.label: Choose space within 3, roll red, each on/adjacent suffers Hit (1 adjacent 1 dmg honor)

Hidden Trap.label: Choose terminal, each adjacent 2 Damage (one 2 dmg honor)

Jundland Terror.label: Tusken/Bantha gain 2 MP, interrupt attack (2 MP honor)

Demoralizing Monologue.label: Reroll 1 defense die, reveal hand remove die (1 defense remove honor)

Field Supply.label: Up to 2 within 3 gain Hit or Surge token (1 PT honor)

Field Tactician.label: Friendly within 2 may interrupt move (1 MP honor)

Hunter Protocol.label: Trigger same Surge up to twice (+1 Surge honor)

I Can Feel It.label: Reroll defense/attack die or 1 VP (Focus honor)

Lightbow.label: Ranged attack blue red green +2 Acc Pierce 4 (manual)

Lure of the Dark Side.label: Hostile +2 Hit Tokens, attack with that figure, then 2 Strain

Call the Vanguard.label: TROOPER cost 4+ interrupt move+attack (2 MP honor)

Feral Swipes.label: Melee attack per die in pool (1 attack honor)

Furious Charge.label: After attack on you: if suffered 3+ ready deployment (Focus honor)

Blood Feud.label: Place on hostile DC; when attack that group +1 Hit

Ballistics Matrix.label: Attachment: exhaust before attack; figures do not block LOS (manual)

Battlefield Awareness.label: After friendly within 3 rolls dice: reroll 1 of those dice (manual)

Behind Enemy Lines.label: In opponent deployment zone: look at top 3 of their deck, return in any order (manual)

Blaze of Glory.label: After activation resolves: ready Deployment card; at EOR suffer 3 Damage (manual)

Bodyguard.label: When attack declared on adjacent friendly: attack targets you instead (2 MP honor to get in position)

Cal's Buddy.label: Deploy BD-1 to your or adjacent space; activates at start/end of your activation (manual)

Capitalize.label: While attacking: choose 1 die, its controller rerolls (remove 1 defense die honor)

Combat Resupply.label: Distribute Hit tokens = round number to friendly within 3 (1 PT honor)

Deadly Precision.label: Start of activation: this round -1 Dodge to defense when you attack

Efficient Travel.label: Start of round: this round figures ignore difficult terrain and hostile MP cost (1 MP honor)

Elusive.label: While defending: remove 1 attack die and 1 defense die from results

Findsman Meditation.label: Start of round: choose opponent group; when they activate interrupt to move or attack (2 MP honor)

Change of Plans.label: After you resolve a group's activation: exhaust 1 DC to ready 1 other same trait (manual)

Chaotic Force.label: Start of round SCUM: each player chooses 3 figures, roll green, strain = Accuracy. Resolve manually.

Cheat to Win.label: When you use Gambit after rolling: change that die to another result (manual)

Choose a Side.label: This round friendly Mobile gain SCUM/IMPERIAL ability (manual)

Collect Intel.label: Start of round if SPY on map: look at opponent's hand (manual)

Corrupting Force.label: Start of round IMPERIAL: each player chooses 3 figures, roll blue, damage = Hits. Resolve manually.

Cut Lines.label: Start of Status Phase: players cannot draw Command cards this round (manual)

Dangerous Bargains.label: Start of round if 30 or fewer VPs: you and opponent each gain 3 VPs (manual)

Double or Nothing.label: While attacking: choose a die, its controller rerolls it; if same number of symbols, double or cancel results. Resolve manually.

Expose Weakness.label: Choose adjacent hostile: next attack targeting that figure gains Pierce 3 (manual)

Force Push.label: Choose another SMALL figure within 3 spaces; push that figure up to 2 spaces. Resolve manually.

Harsh Environment.label: Start of round: this round figures on exterior spaces -1 Evade; figures not on exterior +1 Block. Resolve manually.

Marksman.label: Before declaring a Ranged attack: figures do not block line of sight for this attack. Resolve manually.
